text: Wild Romance may refer to:- *Wild Romance (band), also known as Herman Brood & his Wild Romance, backing band of Dutch singer-pianist Herman Brood *Wild Romance (2006 film), a biopic about Dutch singer and artist Herman Brood *Wild Romance (novel), by Chloe Schama *Wild Romance (TV series), a 2012 South Korean drama series *A Wild Romance, a 1983 album by The Twins
title: Wild Romance
